newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australia Yield Spreads - Outperform U.S. again.
newsitem.headline: Australia Yield Spreads - Outperform U.S. again.

text.p: The Australian bond market outperformed the U.S. again as local debt continued to rebound from Tuesday's post-budget sell-off.

Domestic bonds are also unwinding the chances of a rate hike in the U.S. after Tuesday's Federal Open Market Committee meeting, and there remains an extremely vague hope of a local easing, or at the very least a long period of unchanged policy.
The market was mixed against Canadian debt, which rallied on Thursday after the Canadian dollar put in its biggest one day rally since 1995.
